commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# CleanConnect Pro 2.0 - Mamba/Conda Environment Configuration
#
# Create environment with:
#   mamba env create -f environment.yml
#   conda env create -f environment.yml
#
# Activate environment:
#   mamba activate cleanconnect-pro
#   conda activate cleanconnect-pro
#
# Update environment:
#   mamba env update -f environment.yml --prune
#
# Remove environment:
#   mamba env remove -n cleanconnect-pro
#   conda env remove -n cleanconnect-pro

name: cleanconnect-pro
channels:
  - conda-forge
  - defaults

dependencies:
  # Core Runtime
  - python=3.11
  - nodejs=18.18.2
  - npm::yarn@4.0.2

  # Build Tools
  - make
  - cmake
  - pkg-config
  - gcc
  - gxx

  # Database & Data Management
  - postgresql::postgresql=14
  - postgresql::libpq

  # System Utilities
  - git
  - curl
  - wget
  - jq
  - grep
  - sed
  - awk

  # Development Tools
  - nano
  - vim
  - htop
  - lsof

  # Python Tools (Optional - for data analysis)
  - pip
  - pandas
  - numpy
  - matplotlib

  # SSL/TLS
  - openssl

  # Version Management
  - git-lfs

# Python packages via pip
pip:
  - python-dotenv==1.0.0
  - psycopg2-binary==2.9.9
  - paramiko==3.4.0
  - requests==2.31.0
  - pyyaml==6.0.1

variables:
  NODE_ENV: development
  YARN_VERSION: '>=4.0.0'
  NODE_VERSION: '>=18.0.0'
  PYTHON_VERSION: '>=3.11'
  POSTGRES_VERSION: '>=14'
